actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to provide for the application of the Generalized System of Preferences to Western Hemisphere countries.

summary.text: Excludes any country which is located in North America, Central America, South America, and the Caribbean from provisions of the Trade Act of 1974 which exclude nations belonging to the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries from the benefits of the system of general tariff preferences.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to provide for the application of the Generalized System of Preferences to Western Hemisphere countries.
